## Source: ossf-package-analysis (74012077041418bce1aed1339b95d0221435cff33db310194f29d9a0c2451e6e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'liblapack3' @ 0.0.2 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
